Reviews.Title: Cheap cost = cheap product
Reviews.Author: S. Carr
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cables for a CCTV system.  Two of the connectors broke when I tried to secure the connectors to the CCTV monitor.  The connectors did not fit properly and when I put a little pressure on the connectors, the connectors broke.  Cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Good product for money
Reviews.Author: Henry Latty
Reviews.Content: It met all my needs and expectation, it was just what the doctor ordered. Hope to purchase again soon as needs arises.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Alexander Chow "alleychow"
Reviews.Content: It is a little bit thinner than the cables that came with the original Q-see setup but works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Perfect replacement.
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. Just what I needed. Had my cameras up and running. However an invasion of rodents chewed through my lines on some of my cameras... These were perfect to replace the damaged lines. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: why do it yourself?
Reviews.Author: George Larsen
Reviews.Content: the best little cables for the lazy hobbiest, like me. I'm cheep too. but thanks just the same.  George Larsen

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Macho Dent
Reviews.Content: on time great product i do not know what else to say if you did have too say so much

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready
4 x 25 feet video/power cables in white
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Pack of 25ft All-In-One Premade Siamese Video & Power BNC Cable for CCTV Security Camera Surveillance System
